org.glassfish.enterprise.iiop.api

Interface IIOPSSLUtil

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IIOPSSLUtilImpl

    @Contract
public interface IIOPSSLUtil
    This class tries to avoid the need for orb-iiop to depend on some security modules for getting SSL related info
    Author:
    Kumar
